body.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance Free Hydrating Gel Facial Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid, Daily Foaming Face Wash & Makeup Remover, Gentle Face Wash, Non-Comedogenic, 7.8 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 26 mins
features: Hydro Boost Hydrating Cleansing Gel for face with Hyaluronic Acid, gently and thoroughly cleanses and clinically proven to boost skin's moisture and lock it in
The daily facial cleanser transforms into a silky foaming lather to remove makeup, dirt, oil & impurities from skin while leaving it feeling soft & supple

The fragrance free foaming face wash contains purified hyaluronic acid, an essential hydrator naturally found in skin. Recognized by dermatologists, Hyaluronic Acid binds to water and holds it within skin’s surface
This lightweight & gentle face cleanser is ideal for cleansing dry, acne-prone & sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic & non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores.

7.8-fluid ounces of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance-Free Hydrating Foaming Facial Cleanser Gel with hyaluronic acid, this formula is free from fragrance, soaps, parabens, phthalates, & alcohol & respects skin's moisture barrier
body.description: Looking for a face cleanser that gently and thoroughly cleanses while providing hydration? Try Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance Free Hydrating Gel Facial Cleanser. This foaming facial cleanser from a dermatologist-recommended brand is perfect for dry, sensitive, and acne-prone skin. It transforms into a silky foaming lather that removes dirt, oil, makeup & impurities while leaving skin soft & supple. With Barrier Care Technology and hyaluronic acid, a natural skin hydrator, this gentle face wash respects your skin's moisture barrier and boosts hydration levels. The lightweight formula is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, and free of fragrance, soaps, parabens, phthalates, and alcohol. It's a great addition to your skin care routine and lathers easily, rinsing clean. For even more hydration, pair with other products in Neutrogena's Hydro Boost line. Try it today for glowing, hydrated skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great fragrance free cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash. It is inexpensive, non-drying, and fragrance free. I have a bottle and use the refill bag to fill up the bottle. I got these for a great price on Prime Day. It is gentle and does not leave my skin feeling stripped. I typically do a double cleanse, and use a balm cleanser prior to this. I cannot comment on how well it removes makeup as a first cleanse, but works great as a second cleanse. I use it to wash my hands a lot because I find it's less drying than most hand soaps. Overall, a great purchase that I will continue to re-buy in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome quality great price
reviews.reviewText: This Neutrogena cleanser with hyaluronic acid has been an amazing find for my skincare routine! Since I started using it, I have noticed a noticeable improvement in the hydration of my skin.What I like most is how it gently cleanses my face without leaving residue or that dry feeling that other cleansers usually leave. Although it does not have a scent, I consider it an advantage, since there are no fragrances that can irritate the skin.The formula with hyaluronic acid is excellent; I feel like my skin is revitalized with every wash. It effectively removes impurities without compromising my skin's natural hydration, something I greatly value.Plus, its softness makes it ideal even for my sensitive skin, which is a big plus.In short, this Neutrogena cleanser with hyaluronic acid has become a must-have in my daily routine. If you're looking for a cleanser that leaves no residue and provides that extra hydration without added fragrance, I definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't smell that great
reviews.reviewText: Even though it was advertised as fragrance free there was a weird smell. It works fine. It's better at moisturizing as a Cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: I would order again, it cleanses yet leaves your skin feeling soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a week so far , twice a day now with the matching hydroboost moisturizer and it’s absolutely amazing! I had issues with dry skin and one use and not only was the dry skin gone but my face is so much smoother and softer and has a bit of a glow to it! There’s a slight smell to it, kind of like a basic soap smell. And I only wish it was a bit thicker and had a bit of color to it, to make it easier to not use way too much on accident. But regardless, I would 100% recommend this either just on its own or with the matching moisturizer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I used this to replace my regular Cerave Moisturizing face wash. I feel like this product does a great job as a replacement since it feels refreshing and has similar cleansing properties to Cerave. It also is good for sensitive skin as I didn't feel any burning sensations as I've had with other facial cleansers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, great value for the price. My skin looks clear and feels clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Absolute Necessity
reviews.reviewText: I have extremely sensitive skin and have tried numerous products. This is now my SENSITIVE SKIN HOLY GRAIL! It's light, takes off makeup, and still leaves my skin feeling hydrated. Which some facial washes make you feel dry and tight, this one helps your skin breathe, (my skin and opinion obviously) But if you've got sensitive skin, I PROMISE you will love this. It's worth the price, lasts me at least a month (with washing twice a day), get it!!!
El producto es ligero, huele bien, limpia y se enjuaga con facilidad

reviews.reviewTitle: Esta muy bien pero no tanto.
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta porque no tiene fragancia, peeero me reseca la piel! Jaja se supone que debería ser un poco hidratante y no tengo problema porque mi piel es grasa PERO una piel seca si le puede ir mal. El producto llegó en buen estado
